radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral ground-glass opacities predominantly in the upper lobes, opacities in small airways of the lower lobes consistent with mucous plugging, bronchial-wall thickening, bilateral pulmonary nodules, enlarged mediastinal lymph nodes, and trace bilateral pleural effusions.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Bilateral pulmonary nodules that had progressed since the previous CT study obtained 2 days earlier.

radiographic_examinations.findings: A faint patchy opacity in the left upper lobe and trace bilateral pleural effusions.
